home.navigate: This will navigate the user to the dashboard component.
home.search: This will navigate the user to the searched activity.

modulo.labels.name: Name
modulo.labels.noterepeats:
Note: 'Repeats' and 'Repeats every' cannot not be modified if there are active accounts
(JLG Loans, Recurring Deposits etc) dependent on this meeting.
modulo.labels.transferinterestlinkedq: Transfer Interest to Linked Savings Account?
modulo.labels.arewantcalculateinteresq: Are you sure you want to calculate interest ?
modulo.labels.arewantinactivatecharge: Are you sure you want to inactivate charge with id: {{ id }} ?
modulo.labels.arewantpostinterest: Are you sure you want to post interest ?
modulo.labels.arewantwaivecharge: Are you sure you want to waive charge with id: {{ id }} ?
modulo.labels.depositfrequencymeeting: Deposit Frequency Same as Group/Center meeting
modulo.labels.adjustadvancepaymentsq: Adjust advance payments toward future installments?
modulo.configurationwizard.description: Following guide tour will help you configure Mifos according to your organization needs.
modulo.configurationwizard.descriptionsu: You have successfully completed the setup of Configuration Wizard.
modulo.configurationwizard.descriptioncr: You have created {{step}} successfully. Please select from the options below to proceed furthur.
modulo.configurationwizard.descriptionsu: You have successfully completed the setup of {{ previous }}
modulo.configurationwizard.title: Welcome to Mifos
modulo.login.twoauth.title: Two Factor Authentication
modulo.login.descriptionhome: EsfuerzaTech is designed by the Mifos Initiative. A global community that aims to speed the elimination of poverty by enabling Organizations to more effectively and efficiently deliver responsible financial services to the world’s poor and unbanked. Sounds interesting? Get involved!
modulo.shell.description.breadcrumb: This will show the user's current location in the app.
modulo.shell.description.user: This section contains user name, user photograph, user settings and sign out button.
modulo.shell.description.logo: This logo will return the user to the welcome page from anywhere in the system.
modulo.shell.description.shortcut: This contains shortcut to the frequently accessed components.
modulo.shell.description.dashboard: This will navigate the user to dashboard component.
modulo.shell.description.navigation: This will navigate the user to entity navigation screen.
modulo.shell.description.journal: Shortcut to Journal entry screen with accouting rules in place.
modulo.shell.description.createjournal: Shortcut to the create journal entry screen.
modulo.shell.description.chartaccount: Shortcut to chart of accounts screen to add/modify the ledger accounts.
modulo.shell.description.institution: This button will be used for individual accounts, groups and centers
modulo.shell.description.tools: This button opens the menu to access the system tools required by the accounting department.
modulo.shell.description.reports: Dropdown provides access to all types of system reports including the defualt reports provided by the Mifos and system reports that will be developed by the organization.
modulo.shell.description.admin: This is where the system is setup according to your organization including users, organization, products and templates.
modulo.shell.description.selfservice: Dropdown provides access to self service user administrative portal, app configuration and task management.
modulo.shell.description.wizard: This buttons opens up the configuration wizard to help the user in initial setup and application tour.
modulo.shell.description.search: This will allow the user to quickly navigate the system selecting entity while searching makes the navigation more robust.
modulo.shell.description.language: Organization can select a language here from the available languages here.
modulo.shell.description.theme: This will be used to choose a theme as per organization will.
modulo.shell.description.menu: This will have logged in user settings and sign out button.
modulo.loans.title.calculateinterest: Calculate interest for exact days in partial period
modulo.loans.title.loantranche: Loan Tranche Details are not allowed for this Loan Product
modulo.loans.labels.adjustinterest: Adjust interest rates for remainder of loan
modulo.loans.labels.allowpartialinterest: Allow Partial Interest Calculation with same as repayment
modulo.loans.labels.recalculatenewterms: Recalculate Interest based on new terms
modulo.loans.header.name: Name
modulo.description.clickfillingdetail: Click to start filling the details. * mark fields are neccessary. For more details click: Chart of Accounts
modulo.description.alternativewayview: There is an alternative way to view your accounts - using the Tree View.
modulo.description.optionallowscreategla: This option allows you to create new GL accounts.
modulo.description.searchfilterglaccount: Search bar to filter GL accounts.
modulo.description.listchartallacount: List of chart of all the accounts being used by your organization.
modulo.description.optionallowsclosure: This option allows you to create new closure.
modulo.description.searchfilterclosure: Search bar to filter closures by office.
modulo.description.listclosure: List of closures. To know more click: Closing Entries
modulo.description.fieldredasterisk: Fields with a red asterisk (*) are required. To know more click: Add Journal Entries
modulo.description.listaccountdifferent: List of accounts linked to different financial activities. To know more click: Accounts linked to Financial Activities
modulo.description.formusedmigrate: This form will be used to migrate opening balances. To know more click: Migrate opening balances (Office-wise)
modulo.description.arewantreverttransact: Are you sure you want to revert this transaction?
modulo.description.journalcreatedreverse: A new journal entry has been created to reverse this transaction
modulo.description.createjournal: Manual journal entry transactions recorded in a journal.
modulo.description.searchjournal: Advanced search option for journal entries
modulo.description.listfinacialactivitie: List of Financial Activities and GL Account Mappings
modulo.description.migratebalances: Set or update office-level opening balances for GL accounts
modulo.description.chartaccounts: List of accounts used by the organization
modulo.description.closingentries: Journal entries made at the end of accounting period
modulo.description.accruals: Accrues income, expenses and liabilities as on the provided date
modulo.description.chartaccount: The Chart of Accounts - General Ledger Setup allows you to organize your different accounts within Mifos X.
modulo.description.accountlinkedactiviti: Accounts linked to Financial Activities are mapped accounts which are needed to do system generating accounting transaction.
modulo.description.makeeasierorganizatio: This makes it easier for an organization wanting to move to Mifos to transfer GL account balances (from their existing accounting application or manual system) to Mifos X Accounting.
modulo.description.canclosejournal: In Mifos X, you can close accounting to journal entries. Closures can be applied to all branches or to each branch separately. It is important for organizations to close accounting periodically to prevent transactions that affect the accounting books.
modulo.description.journalessentially: Journal Entries are essentially logs of all the transactions in your organization that have accounting implications.
modulo.description.arewantdeleteclientsi: Are you sure you want to delete this clients signature ?
modulo.description.arewantunassignstaff: Are you sure you want to unassign staff for this client ?
modulo.description.norepaymentanddisbusa: No repayments and disbursal are available for selected client and meeting date
modulo.validation.maxQuantity: Quantity can not be more than {{ maxQuantity }}
modulo.validations.leastdayselected: At least one day must be selected
modulo.validations.centernamespecialchar: Center Name cannot begin with a special character or number
modulo.validations.clientnamespecialchar: Client name cannot begin with a special character or number
modulo.validations.clientfirstnamespecia: Client first name cannot begin with a special character or number
modulo.validations.lastnamespecialchar: Client last name cannot begin with a special character or number
modulo.validations.mindepositfrequencyty: Minimum Deposit Term Frequency Type is required
